statements: SELECT * FROM verification_process WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT voter_name FROM verification_process WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM verification_process WHERE voter_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM verification_process WHERE verification_status = FALSE;
SELECT voter_name, verification_status FROM verification_process ORDER BY verification_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM verification_process;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM verification_process WHERE verification_status = true;
SELECT * FROM verification_process WHERE voter_id = 123 AND voter_name = 'Alice';
SELECT voter_name, voter_id FROM verification_process WHERE verification_status = false;
SELECT voter_name, voter_id, verification_status FROM verification_process ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM verification_process
SELECT voter_name, verification_status, id FROM verification_process
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM voting_registration WHERE registration_status = true
SELECT * FROM verification_process WHERE id = 1
SELECT voter_name FROM verification_process WHERE verification_status = false
SELECT * FROM verification_process WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT voter_name, verification_status FROM verification_process WHERE voter_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT voter_name, verification_status FROM verification_process WHERE voter_name = 'Alice' AND verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, registration_status, registration_date FROM voting_registration WHERE registration_status = FALSE ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT id, voter_id, registration_status FROM voting_registration WHERE registration_status = TRUE LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM verification_requests;
SELECT request_id, request_status FROM verification_requests WHERE request_id = 100;
SELECT request_id, request_date FROM verification_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT verification_code, request_date FROM verification_requests WHERE request_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM verification_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM verification_requests WHERE request_status = 'pending';
SELECT request_id, voter_id, verification_code FROM verification_requests WHERE voter_id = 1001;
SELECT MAX(request_date) FROM verification_requests;
SELECT request_id, log_description FROM verification_requests LEFT JOIN verification_logs ON verification_requests.request_id = verification_logs.request_id;
SELECT request_id, verification_result FROM verification_results WHERE result_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM verification WHERE verification_id = 1;
SELECT voter_name, voter_email FROM voter;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_party FROM candidate WHERE candidate_id = 3;
SELECT vote_id, voter_id, candidate_id, vote_timestamp FROM vote ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT verification_id, voter_id, verification_code FROM verification WHERE voter_id = 5;
SELECT verification_id, voter_id, verification_code FROM verification WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, voter_email, voter_phone FROM voter WHERE voter_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_votes, candidate_id FROM vote GROUP BY candidate_id ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT c.candidate_id, c.candidate_name, v.vote_timestamp FROM candidate c JOIN vote v ON c.candidate_id = v.candidate_id;
SELECT v.voter_name, c.candidate_name FROM vote v JOIN candidate c ON v.candidate_id = c.candidate_id WHERE v.vote_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Voters;
SELECT voter_name, voter_email FROM Voters;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_party FROM Candidates;
SELECT vote_id, voter_id, candidate_id, vote_time FROM Votes;
SELECT verification_status, verification_time FROM Verification_Log;
SELECT * FROM Voters;
SELECT voter_name, voter_email FROM Voters WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_party FROM Candidates ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT a.*, v.* FROM Audit_Log a JOIN Votes v ON a.user_id = v.voter_id;
SELECT v.voter_name, c.candidate_name FROM Votes v JOIN Candidates c ON v.candidate_id = c.candidate_id WHERE v.vote_time >= '2022-01-01';
